title: Never got to serve my 14 day suspension
body: I know this is a long shot, while i deserve this 14 day ban,but someone said since my 14 day suspension went directly to perm, and i never got to server it sometimes riot will remove the perm and let me fix my mistakes. Which i hope is true, i read what i said, and i realize i was very out of line, i didnt realize how toxic i was, im sorry, i hope what this person said is true so i can fix what i did, and serve my 14 days and get back to playing league. thank you for reading this

replies.body: It looks like the punishment actually skipped a step due to how extreme the toxicity was in that match. You're welcome to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for the full context, as I don't want to give out your personal chat logs on the boards.
i would but my account isnt verified with an email so i cant login to support, what should i do?
